document_data.caption: A map showing Dornsar's Ride.
document_data.name: Dornsar's Ride
document_data.mainbody: '''Dornsar's Ride''' was a small road found in western [[Sembia]] connecting the small towns of [[Kulta]] and [[Huddagh]].
document_data.Description: Dornsar's Ride passed northwest from Huddagh to Kulta. In addition to connecting the small towns, the road also connected the larger [[Way of the Manticore]] and [[Dawnpost]].
